other_tests.findings: Confirmed the diagnosis of aromatase deficiency; revealed homozygosity for a C-base deletion in exon 5 of the CYP19 gene.
Lumbar spine aBMD at baseline was remarkably low.
other_tests.changes_over_time: During 41 months of estrogen treatment, aBMD improved by 23% at the lumbar spine and by 14% at the femoral neck.

other_tests.findings: Total vBMD did not change significantly; no significant changes observed in trabecular or cortical vBMD.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Bone size increased dramatically by 46%, and cortical thickness increased by 12%.
